data.name: Youcef Oudjidane
data.title: Founder and Managing Partner
description: Youcef is the co-founder of Bloom, a fintech startup in East Africa helping consumers protect and grow their wealth. He started his investing career with the Dubai Government and more recently, was a managing partner at Class 5 Global.
Youcef has an undergraduate degree in mathematics from the Univeristy of Nottingham.

data.name: Ahmed Sabbah
data.title: Venture Partner
description: Ahmed is the co-founder & CEO of Telda, a digital banking app in Egypt. Prior to founding Telda, Ahmed was the co-founder and CTO of Swvl (NASDAQ: SWVL).
Ahmed has an undergraduate degree in computer science from the German University in Cairo.

data.name: Shekinah Adewumi
data.title: Venture Partner
description: Shekinah is the co-founder & CEO of Apata, a fraud prevention provider for fintech issuers. Prior to founding Apata, Shekinah co-founded Touchtech Payments, which was acquired by Stripe in 2018.
Shekinah has an undergraduate degree in engineering from Dublin City University.

data.name: Kieran Gibbs
data.title: Venture Partner
description: Kieran is a professional football player, currently playing for Inter Miami. He began his professional career with Arsenal and went on to make more than 200 appearances for the club. He made his full England debut in 2010.

data.name: Khalid Al Saud
data.title: Associate
description: Prior to joining Byld, Khalid was an associate at Class 5 Global.
Khalid studied international business at Long Island University.

data.name: Khalil Osman
data.title: Associate
description: Before Byld, Khalil was at Visa in the corporate strategy and M&A division focusing on the CEMEA region. Additionally, he spent time in strategy consulting at Kearney between New York and Dubai.
Khalil has an undergraduate degree in economics from New York University.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.caption: We back technical and resourceful founders bylding in Africa

data.title: Bylding personal, enduring bonds with founders
data.description: We strive to be the most accessible and supportive early-stage investor, both on the field and off the field. Whether the central bank revoked your license, or your better half kicked you out of your apartment, we will be always be there.

data.title: Fiercely competitive
data.description: We resemble the founders with whom we back: restless with an abnormal desire to win. We galvanize founders beset with an unwavering focus to solve the one thing they think is broken.

data.title: Content with imperfection
data.description: Businesses mature over decades and there are many incalculable variables, from macroeconomic and geopolitical risks to evolving regulatory landscapes. We’re comfortable with the unknowable’s and focus on what can go right, as opposed to what can go wrong.

data.title: Our focus is narrow
data.description: We invest early - in many instances, before a line of code has been written. Fintech is our bread and butter. Its what we know and love.

data.title: We are nimble
data.description: We prefer to lead rounds but are happy to participate. We move quickly and avoid unnecessary diligence.

data.title: Two pizza pies
data.description: We tend to work best with technical and resourceful founders that work really hard.

data.title: Freebank
data.description: Index Ventures | Canaan Partners | Raba Partnership

p.text: This a must stay n worth every penny. The host was great, the place was great, great ambience, a quiet place but just few minutes walk to all the central points. The hospitality was great and the host was very helpful and accessible for all my needs. Special thanks to Gaia and Tato who actually received me like family and came in person while i was saying my bye too. I would really want to come back for a longer stay. Love the place and love u guys.
